content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-46.5, -123.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at position (-46.5, -123.5)
- Steam Engine at position (-40.5, -113.5)
- Multiple small electric poles connecting the steam engine to the power network

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -76.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -76.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -73.0) for smelting iron ore

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, -62.0) for smelting iron ore
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) for transferring iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (6.5, -59.5) for storing iron plates

### Additional Furnaces
- Stone Furnace at position (9.0, -64.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, -62.0) with iron plates

### Pipe Networks
- Multiple Pipe Groups at various positions, currently empty and not connected

### Lab
- Lab with no power, requiring automation science packs

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Reconnecting Pipes
- Ensure there is no blockage in the path where pipes are being connected. Clear any obstructions before attempting to connect pipes.

### Errors When Inserting Items into Furnaces
- Verify the type of ore already present in the furnace before inserting new items. Ensure the furnace inventory is not full and matches the type of ore being inserted.

### Errors Due to Full Inventory in Furnaces
- Check the furnace inventory capacity before attempting to insert items. Ensure there is enough space to accommodate the new items.
